tasks.task: Physical tasks and subtasks related to coconut nursery production and farming.
Planting coconut trees (age, spacing, site preparation)
subtasks: Prepare nursery sites (checking soil drainage, clearing weeds, mixing compost)
Selecting high-quality coconut seedlings (differences between hybrid and non-hybrid, understanding nursery origins)
Proper planting techniques (correct spacing, hole digging, seedling placement)

tasks.task: Managing coconut nurseries and farms (fertilization, mulching, salt application)
subtasks: Applying organic fertilizers (manure, compost tea)
Managing soil moisture (creating appropriate soil conditions, mulching, conserving moisture)
Salt application for disease prevention and crop health

tasks.task: Irrigation and water management (implications of not having irrigations)
subtasks: Timing of planting (advantages of early planting during rainy season)
Weed management (importance of regular weeding, intercropping considerations)

tasks.task: Pest and disease control (identifying and managing root rot, weevil infestations)
subtasks: Preventing and treating root rot using appropriate fungicides or natural methods
Controlling weevils through integrated pest management practices (lua de elfos)

tasks.task: Long-term management and maintenance (fertilizer application, pruning, monitoring)
subtasks: Monitoring nutrient levels and adjusting fertilizers accordingly
Pruning for optimal fruit production and tree health

tasks.task: Harvesting and post-harvest handling (storage, processing, marketing)
subtasks: Collecting mature coconuts (checking for ripe nuts, proper harvesting techniques)
Processing coconuts (extracting water, milk, oil, and meat)

tasks.task: Integrated pest management (combining chemical and non-chemical methods)
subtasks: Using natural predators for pest control
Monitoring and adjusting pest control methods as needed

tasks.task: Sustainable farming practices (soil conservation, composting, cover cropping)
subtasks: Implementing cover cropping to improve soil health
Using crop rotation to prevent soil depletion and pest buildup

tasks.task: Jobs and tasks for maintaining a coconut nursery and farm
subtasks: Monitoring nursery growth and ensuring proper spacing
Timely application of fertilizer and other inputs
Regular inspection for pests and diseases
Harvesting and processing coconuts
Customer service and seedling sales
Field visits and consultations with other farmers.
